review: I ordered two of these and I'm a bit disappointed.  I'm a Prime member, Neflix member and Plex user.  My number on problem is the wifi. The description says 'better wifi' but I'm not sure better than what. I have the TV right next to my wireless router and I have a fiber connection but I constantly get the 'Home screen not available' error and losing connection to the wifi.  I can't get to Netflix anymore on either device and Plex hardly ever works. Last night for example I watched Plex on my tablet which was further from the wifi router instead of on the TV because nothing (not restarting or unplugging) would work.  In short, this might be great for Amazon only users, but the wifi seems to be extremely weak.  So, the device is okay, but I'm going to be giving mine away and buying a Roku instead.
author: Amazon Customer "talia679"
